00011 void WIZ_EmuKeyboard( int button, int value )
00012 {
00013  SDL_Event fakeevent1;
00014 
00015  //printf( "Button %d Value %d\n", button, value );
00016 
00017  volume_direction = VOLUME_NOCHG;
00018 
00019  joy_but_pressed[button] = value;
00020  if( value == 1 ) {
00021   fakeevent1.type              = SDL_KEYDOWN;
00022   fakeevent1.key.state         = SDL_PRESSED;
00023   fakeevent1.key.type          = SDL_KEYDOWN;
00024   fakeevent1.key.keysym.mod    = KMOD_NONE;
00025  }
00026  else {
00027   fakeevent1.type              = SDL_KEYUP;
00028   fakeevent1.key.state         = SDL_RELEASED;
00029   fakeevent1.key.type          = SDL_KEYUP;
00030   fakeevent1.key.keysym.mod    = KMOD_NONE;
00031  }
00032 
00033  //printf( "Button %d %d\n", button, value );
00034  fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_UNKNOWN;
00035 
00036  if( button == GP2X_BUTTON_RIGHT )
00037  {
00038   fakeevent1.key.keysym.unicode = fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_RIGHT;
00039  }
00040  if( button == GP2X_BUTTON_LEFT )
00041  {
00042   fakeevent1.key.keysym.unicode = fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_LEFT;
00043  }
00044  if( button == GP2X_BUTTON_UP )
00045  {
00046   fakeevent1.key.keysym.unicode = fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_UP;
00047  }
00048  if( button == GP2X_BUTTON_DOWN )
00049  {
00050   fakeevent1.key.keysym.unicode = fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_DOWN;
00051  } 
00052 #if 0
00053  // Right press
00054  if( (button == GP2X_BUTTON_RIGHT || button == GP2X_BUTTON_UPRIGHT || button == GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNRIGHT) &&
00055      ((value == 1 &&
00056      (joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_RIGHT] ||  joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_UPRIGHT] ||  joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNRIGHT])) ||
00057      (value == 0 &&
00058      (!joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_RIGHT] && !joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_UPRIGHT] && !joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNRIGHT])))    )
00059  {
00060      fakeevent1.key.keysym.unicode = fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_RIGHT;
00061  }
00062 
00063  // Left press
00064  if( (button == GP2X_BUTTON_LEFT || button == GP2X_BUTTON_UPLEFT || button == GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNLEFT) &&
00065      ((value == 1 &&
00066      (joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_LEFT] ||  joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_UPLEFT] ||  joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNLEFT])) ||
00067      (value == 0 &&

00069  {
00070      fakeevent1.key.keysym.unicode = fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_LEFT;
00071  }
00072 
00073  // Up press
00074  if( (button == GP2X_BUTTON_UP || button == GP2X_BUTTON_UPLEFT || button == GP2X_BUTTON_UPRIGHT) &&
00075      ((value == 1 &&
00076      (joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_UP] ||  joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_UPLEFT] ||  joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_UPRIGHT])) ||
00077      (value == 0 &&
00078      (!joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_UP] && !joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_UPLEFT] && !joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_UPRIGHT])))    )
00079  {
00080      fakeevent1.key.keysym.unicode = fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_UP;
00081  }
00082 
00083  // Down press
00084  if( (button == GP2X_BUTTON_DOWN || button == GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNLEFT || button == GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNRIGHT) &&
00085      ((value == 1 &&
00086      (joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_DOWN] ||  joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNLEFT] ||  joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNRIGHT])) ||
00087      (value == 0 &&
00088      (!joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_DOWN] && !joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNLEFT] && !joy_but_pressed[GP2X_BUTTON_DOWNRIGHT])))    )
00089  {
00090      fakeevent1.key.keysym.unicode = fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_DOWN;
00091  }
00092 #endif
00093 
00094  switch(button)
00095  {
00096   case GP2X_BUTTON_SELECT:
00097    fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_RETURN;
00098    break;
00099   case GP2X_BUTTON_START:
00100    fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_ESCAPE;
00101    break;
00102   case GP2X_BUTTON_A:
00103    fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_LCTRL;
00104    break;
00105   case GP2X_BUTTON_B:
00106    fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_LALT;
00107    break;
00108   case GP2X_BUTTON_X:
00109    fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_SPACE;
00110    break;
00111   case GP2X_BUTTON_Y:
00112    fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym = SDLK_F3;
00113    break;
00114   case GP2X_BUTTON_VOLUP:
00115    if( value == 1)
00116     volume_direction = VOLUME_UP;
00117    break;
00118   case GP2X_BUTTON_VOLDOWN:
00119    if( value == 1)
00120     volume_direction = VOLUME_DOWN;
00121    break;
00122  }
00123 
00124  if( fakeevent1.key.keysym.sym != SDLK_UNKNOWN )
00125  {
00126   SDL_PushEvent (&fakeevent1);
00127  }
00128 }

00130 void WIZ_AdjustVolume( int direction )
00131 {
00132  if( direction != VOLUME_NOCHG )
00133  {
00134   if( volume <= 10 )
00135   {
00136    if( direction == VOLUME_UP )   volume += VOLUME_CHANGE_RATE/2;
00137    if( direction == VOLUME_DOWN ) volume -= VOLUME_CHANGE_RATE/2;
00138   }
00139   else
00140   {
00141    if( direction == VOLUME_UP )   volume += VOLUME_CHANGE_RATE;
00142    if( direction == VOLUME_DOWN ) volume -= VOLUME_CHANGE_RATE;
00143   }
00144 
00145   if( volume < VOLUME_MIN ) volume = VOLUME_MIN;
00146   if( volume > VOLUME_MAX ) volume = VOLUME_MAX;
00147 
00148   printf( "Volume Change: %i\n", volume );
00149 
00150   unsigned long soundDev = open("/dev/mixer", O_RDWR);
00151   if(soundDev)
00152   {
00153    int vol = ((volume << 8) | volume);
00154    ioctl(soundDev, SOUND_MIXER_WRITE_PCM, &vol);
00155    close(soundDev);
00156   }
00157  }
00158 }

00162 #ifdef WIZ
00163 
00164 #define TIMER_BASE3 0x1980
00165 #define TIMER_REG(x) memregs32[(TIMER_BASE3 + x) >> 2]
00166 
00167 void WIZ_ptimer_init(void)
00168 {
00169  /* open /dev/mem to access registers */
00170  memfd = open("/dev/mem", O_RDWR);
00171  if(memfd < 0) {
00172   printf( "Could not open /dev/mem!\n" );
00173   return;
00174  }
00175 
00176  /* get access to the registers */
00177  memregs32 = (volatile uint32_t*)mmap(0, 0x20000, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, memfd, 0xC0000000);
00178  if(memregs32 == (volatile uint32_t*)0xFFFFFFFF) {
00179      printf( "Could not mmap hardware registers!\n" );
00180      return;
00181  }
00182 
00183     TIMER_REG(0x44) = 0x922;
00184     TIMER_REG(0x40) = 0x0c;
00185     TIMER_REG(0x08) = 0x6b;
00186 
00187     printf( "Wiz hardware timer started\n" );
00188 }
00189 
00190 unsigned int WIZ_ptimer_get_ticks_ms(void)
00191 {
00192     unsigned int microsec;
00193 
00194     TIMER_REG(0x08) = 0x4b;  /* run timer, latch value */
00195     microsec = TIMER_REG(0);
00196     return (microsec/1000);
00197 }
00198 
00199 void WIZ_ptimer_delay_ms( unsigned int delay )
00200 {
00201     unsigned int start;
00202 
00203     start = WIZ_ptimer_get_ticks_ms();
00204     while(WIZ_ptimer_get_ticks_ms()-start < delay) {}
00205 }
00206 
00207 void WIZ_ptimer_cleanup(void)
00208 {
00209     TIMER_REG(0x40) = 0x0c;
00210     TIMER_REG(0x08) = 0x23;
00211     TIMER_REG(0x00) = 0;
00212     TIMER_REG(0x40) = 0;
00213     TIMER_REG(0x44) = 0;
00214 
00215  memregs32 = NULL;
00216  close(memfd);
00217 
00218  printf( "Wiz hardware timer stoped\n" );
00219 }
00220 #endif
